products_services.name: Celestial VR
products_services.description: A virtual reality platform offering hyper-realistic experiences, from serene walks on Mars to diving into the Marianas Trench, all from the comfort of your living room.

applications.name: Educational Suites
applications.description: Users can explore ancient civilizations, understand complex scientific phenomena, or walk among dinosaurs, making learning truly immersive.

applications.name: Adventure Modules
applications.description: Dive with sharks, climb Everest, or navigate the Amazon rainforest; Celestial VR promises adrenaline-filled experiences without risks.

applications.name: Therapeutic Landscapes
applications.description: Tailored experiences like serene beaches, tranquil forests, or mesmerizing galaxies help users relax and de-stress.
